intro: Zalusianskya, commonly known as the silverleaf sunflower, is a genus of flowering plants in the sunflower family, Asteraceae. It is native to South America, particularly Brazil, and features showy yellow to orange composite flowers. The plants are characterized by their hairy, silver-gray leaves that give them their common name. Zalusianskya species are typically annual or perennial herbs with a robust root system. They are often cultivated for their ornamental value in gardens due to their vibrant blooms and drought tolerance.
